parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets group speed mode. If unit is passed as param, unit's group is used. Mode may be one of: 
* '''"UNCHANGED"''' (unchanged)
* '''"LIMITED"''' (half speed)
* '''"NORMAL"''' (full speed, maintain formation)
* '''"FULL"''' (do not wait for any other units in formation)
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupName '''setSpeedMode''' mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Object]] or [[Group]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_groupOne [[setSpeedMode]] "LIMITED";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[speedMode]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
